```{r}

# Loading Data

data <- read_csv("raw-data/tracker_data.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(company, date, type, coronavirus, key_development) %>% 
  slice(9:122)

data[is.na(data)] = 0

data_clean <- data %>% 
  mutate( key = ifelse(key_development == 0, 0, 1),
          date = mdy(date)) %>% 
  select(- key_development)


ggplot(data_clean, aes(date, company, color = type)) + 
  geom_point()
```
